venue.address_1: off Fort Hill & Beal Street - The entrance across from the West Hingham Commuter Rail Stop
venue.name: Bare Cove

item.description: Bare Cove is in Hingham and it's off leash. The paths are paved and there a beach! Teddy and I miss everyone but we cant go to Burrage Pond anymore till the fall. (Poison Ivy would put me out of work). We go every morning around 9. I can go earlier if people want to join us or we can plan on Saturday mornings. Let me know. 19 Fort Hill St in Hingham Wendy and Teddy
item.how_to_find_us: 19 Fort Hill St in Hingham. You'll see the busses. Take the road where the sign is located all the way to the end past the soccer fields, past the skate boarder ramps, the road dead ends into the park.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Bare Cove Doggie Play Time Saturday mornings
